Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The combination effects of the DPP to TPD ratio with changes in the alkyl chain could affect the π-π stacking distance of P1 , P3 , P4 , P5 , and P7 and backbone planarity , thus influencing their charge transport properties.

Let's think step by step.

Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph presented as a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| DPP |
| TPD |
| P1 |
| P3 |
| P4 |
| P5 |
| P7 |

Note that "DPP" and "TPD" are abbreviations for material names, and "P1", "P3", "P4", "P5", and "P7" are also identified as material names in the paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
